title: Pixel 1 screen flashing and not turning on
content:
while my phone was charging the screen suddenly started to blink/flash. the screen shows "google" on a white screen for a blink with a line from left to right.
trying to go in to safe mode or recovery mode does not help. it just doesn't do anything but go back to flashing screen when connected to the power, or black screen when not connected. All hardware is original.
the barcodes do appear but any other option has no result.
